name: Color by Number - Pixel Coloring Book
name_original: Color by Number - Pixel Coloring Book
description:
Creating modern masterpieces of digital art has never been easier! Choose from a variety of super fun images and follow the numbers to bring them to life. No stress of picking up colors. Just paint by number and enjoy the art of true coloring!

Release your inner artist potential with Color by Number, the #1 pixel coloring book now! This game is a perfect way to relieve your stress as well as a great educational tool for your kids.

Game Features:
- Tons pictures including Animals, Birds, Flowers, Food, Mandalas, Places, and many others
- Enjoy intuitive painting and easy controls of coloring
- Family friendly content: suitable for all ages
- Perfect relaxing activity and educational uses
